reorder-page.title: Restock
reorder-page.description: Get an overview of which items are below a minimum stock quantity

modal-create-reorder.title: Create minimum stock
modal-create-reorder.description: Get notified when an item falls below a selected minimum threshold.
modal-create-reorder.orderAmount-description: This is used to prefill the register reorders form. This can be edited when registrering.
modal-create-reorder.orderAmount-too-big: Max order quantity must be bigger than order quantity
modal-create-reorder.value-not-positive: Value must be a positive number

modal-update-reorder.title: Update minimum stock
modal-update-reorder.description: Get notified when an item falls below a selected minimum threshold
modal-update-reorder.restock-factor-description: This is used to calculate the recommended restock quantity.

modal-delete-reorder.title: Delete minimum stock?
modal-delete-reorder.description: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. If there is an ordered quantity recorded, it will no longer be updated.

modal-add-ordered-reorder.title: Add ordered quantity
modal-add-ordered-reorder.description: The ordered quantity will automatically by updated when an incoming transaction for this product is created.

bulk.title: Register reorders
bulk.description: Register your reorders easily and keep your inventory up to date. Get an overview of ordered items and ensure that stock levels are always accurate.
bulk.red-products: Red products indicates that stock is low, and should be reordered.
bulk.yellow-products: Yellow products indicate that the product is requested.

errors.positive: Needs to be a positive number

list-orders.title: Registered orders
list-orders.description: This is a list of all registered orders on this location

order-details.title: Order
order-details.mail-description: Choose from a list of users, or write an email
